Magnetic Spatula Head: Add a magnet to the head of the spatula to easily pick up small particles of food or dust without making a mess.
Non-slip Spatula: Incorporate a textured surface on the handle to provide better grip, reducing the likelihood of slipping and causing accidents.
Spatula with Integrated Cleaning Brush: Attach a small, retractable brush to the handle for easy cleaning of tight spaces or delicate surfaces.
Spatula with Adjustable Head: Create a spatula with an adjustable head that can be changed to different angles or shapes to suit various tasks.
Spatula with LED Light: Add a small LED light to the handle, illuminating the work area and making it easier to see small details or food particles.
